website_summaries.verdict: This smaller unicycle is a great choice for younger children to learn on.
pros: A well-built unicycle that kids will love
The tough tire and sturdy frame hold up well over time
Steel fork with powder-coated finish is durable
cons: Some customers found that the seat didn't stay in place well

customer_reviews.title: broken!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty cheap and when I got it for my daughter she was very exited but sadly the seat kept pushing into the wheel and made it impossible to ride because every couple seconds you would have to push the seat back up even though it was screwed on all the way. Over all I would reccomend just getting one a bit more expensive
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality... don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: During assembly, the seat post clamp had to be bent (their instructions even said to do it!) to hold at all, one pedal's threading began to strip, two screws began stripping and one screw had the nut head fall off. After less than 1-day of use, bolts are continuing to shearing off, screws have stripped, seat doesn't stay locked in place, plastic on pedals are breaking... VERY poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Erik S Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Great for nine-year old.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a 9 year old boy. In about a week, he mastered this and is now tooling around the neighborhood. Quality is pretty good. No complaints. I'm confident he will outgrow it before he wears it out. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: American Consumer

customer_reviews.title: The frame and seat and wheel seem to be good quality though
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this unicycle seems to be quality. The only complaint is that the seat clamp doesn't hold the seat in place very well. My 9 year old son is always fixing it after a crash. He is still learning so it's frustrating to fall, fix the seat, then try again, fall, fix the seat, try again. The clamp just doesn't hold it in place very solid. The frame and seat and wheel seem to be good quality though.
customer_reviews.author: tkburkett

customer_reviews.title: Not that pleased
customer_reviews.text: This had a problem with the slippage on the seat. It was a challenge to maintain the seat in one position. This may have been just a lemon??
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: The tire doesnt stay inflated...and the seat keeps going down because the twist knob doesnt stay tight enough. Kinda disappointed
customer_reviews.author: dogmama

customer_reviews.title: Not too impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and had to rig the seat with electrical tape to prevent it from sliding up and down. I tried tightening it as far as it would go seat still would not stay put.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: He loved it and is taking unicycle classes..well.made for a 9 yr old. I'd say not for super young kids .age between 9 and 14
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Should be like $19.99
customer_reviews.text: Very crappy build. Parts are crooked. Definitely doesn't support weight it claims. Seat moves when fully tightened. And it's my 9 year old using it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product and color fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Our Granddaughter in college loved it. Great quality and what matters is she was happy
customer_reviews.author: Kay Dawn Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves this unicycle! He's always had great balance. Last year he got stilts and mastered them in 2 day so we where sure he could master this too. It's taking some time but before long he's going to be unicycling all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Caution
customer_reviews.text: It’s for 3-5 yr olds any other would be to heavy. Also be sure you want it they hate to refund honest it’s trash. Tires always pop out and burst seat is not properly fitted so you can get on and ride please save your money
customer_reviews.author: james troutman

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: The seat couldn’t be tightened and his PE teacher wouldn’t let him ride it loose. We took it to a bike shop and the guy suggested buying a decent unicycle as this one was garbage. He did what he could but the seat never did get tight. I do triathlons and this is my bike shop so I trust him. Waste of money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Loveless

customer_reviews.title: Broken and could return
customer_reviews.text: It was broken and tire had a hole in it. The seat would not stay on. Ever bad service, wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Seat doesn't stay tight making it impossible to ride. For how much I paid I expected far from high quality but I should at least function propery... save your money
customer_reviews.author: @deadeye_darren

customer_reviews.title: It is a good quality unicycle for a 1st grader
customer_reviews.text: It is a good quality unicycle for a 1st grader. it is the right size too. Just that unicycles, in general, are hard to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Seat clamp takes a lot of effort
customer_reviews.text: Same as most of the other reviews, only issue is getting the seat clamp to tighten enough to hold the seat in place
customer_reviews.author: Cgorm

customer_reviews.title: One wheel is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Kids are trying to learn to ride it having fun. Went together like my other bigger unicyclse.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Huntzinger

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his unicycle. He rode it an entire day when we received it!
customer_reviews.author: Cherryl Grgic

customer_reviews.title: This worked great for my kids ages 6 to 11
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for my kids ages 6 to 11. It's a good starter unicycle. We've had it for almost a year and it's still in good shape
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Seat post slips
customer_reviews.text: Nothing stops the shaft that the seat is mounted on from slipping down through the frame and onto the tire. Even for my very small eleven year old - the seat post doesn't stay in place
customer_reviews.author: kali

customer_reviews.title: Eh....ok
customer_reviews.text: The seat wasn’t staying locked in place and metal lever to tighten it into place broke within a couple of days. Emailed the seller but haven’t hear back. Not super impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my 8 year old to learn on.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Etl

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: the seat is not very tied, it keeps moving when riding on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ana A. Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Nicely built product and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.text: Nicely built product and shipped quickly, a little "difficult" for my son to do, he's pretty athletic and it's just a matter of time before he gets it. This size not meant for older teens or adult...great product though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey G.

customer_reviews.title: The original package destroyed.
customer_reviews.text: I try to use it but it is small. I asked to return the seller said ok , but the original package was destroyed and can’t return it waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: NOAH G

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!  Totally perfect
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect and exactly what my 9 year old wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure I got the wrong size wheel. But other than that its great!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I was initially pleased with this unicycle
customer_reviews.text: I was initially pleased with this unicycle, but the seat post clamp design is deficient. As tight as I screw down the seat post...the seat still turns. My kid has tried to make it work...but the rotating seat and sliding seat post shaft makes this unusable. I should have sprung for a unicycle at the local bike shop. I also just realized that my 30 day return policy is up. So now I'm stuck with this deficient unicycle. Poor design. Do not buy this unicycle.
customer_reviews.author: B Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It was a huge Christmas hit.
customer_reviews.author: L. Perry

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loves it.. just hope he learns and not break anything
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Came with poped tire and was do able to even be use to don't buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need to aid air
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, shipping fast as promised, easy to put together. Tire needed air added but holds air with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Mom&Nurse

customer_reviews.title: The sit is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The sit is not stable, the sit is to loose
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Beware of cheap junk !
customer_reviews.text: I teach unicycling and have purchased 80 unicycles over the last 25 years. This is by far the worst quality unicycle l've ever encountered. The wheel bearing bolts were too short and l had to purchase others. Two bearing brackets were missing and even though l informed the supplier l never received replacements. The quick release bolt is weak and doesn't work well. All the tire tread wore out to the bare rubber during the first week of use. Stay away from this brand or regret it !
customer_reviews.author: George Douvris

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product - only drawback is no adjustable seat angle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BIG CHRISTMAS FAIL!!! Seat adjustment didn't work; seat slips down until rod impacts tire, acting like a brake
customer_reviews.text: Seat adjustment didn't work; no matter how tight (used wrench!); seat kept slipping down until the rod impact the tire, acting like a brake. BIG CHRISTMAS FAIL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S. Collier

customer_reviews.title: Cheap parts on tire
customer_reviews.text: Manufacturer used electrical tape instead of a rim strip which means that a tube won't hold air. Took this to a bike shop and bought a proper rim strip for $1.99 and replaced the tube, it now holds air.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: nice quality bike. only wish there was an option for a shorter post...we made a seat that would work for out 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Cristin

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Once I am done
customer_reviews.text: This Unicycle is addictive product to keep body balance. But it needs lots of practice to drive. I like it. Once I am done, I will be addicted. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: gr8jon

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The seat of the unicycle will not stay up which is a hazard it seems to be defective
customer_reviews.author: :Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Good reviews are fake.
customer_reviews.text: The clamp used to keep the seat tightened doesn't work. The tools they give you are to small as well. No way to work with this one. In order to make this work you well need to make personal adjustments with your own tools. Maybe like drilling a hole in the seat pools and putting something in it to keep it tight. I'm not sure. I just know it won't work as is.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: Seat keeps moving and my son gets frustrated. Not the best quality.
customer_reviews.author: LoveLucky

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great unicycle for the money, but having trouble getting the seat to stay at the correct height.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia G. Maner

customer_reviews.title: otherwise it's way cool, love the
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had poles for training, otherwise it's way cool, love the colors
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pellecchia II

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 1 and received 2
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered 1 and received 2 because Amazon put it on an outdated Amazon Card card and it was declined. I need to return one.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Pike

customer_reviews.title: but my nephew loves it and is pretty good at
customer_reviews.text: Took longer than 2 days for delivery, but my nephew loves it and is pretty good at it
customer_reviews.author: Amy Begley

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. Can't wait till the snow is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Ninthmyers

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: I imagine a hurt coccyx is coming in the very near future but that is the whole purpose of this device. To someone who knows how to ride it I imagine they would be pretty happy with this unicycle.
customer_reviews.author: scmica

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but too hard for my ten year old so he lost interest quick.
customer_reviews.author: jilly

product_meta.title: AW 16" Inch Wheel Unicycle Leakproof Butyl Tire Wheel Cycling Outdoor Sports Fitness Exercise Health
product_meta.description:
Features: 

Frame: Excellent Manganese Steel, Standard Frame of Unicycle
Crank arms: WHEEL TOP Crank, International Quality
Pedal: YONG HUA Pedals with Chromoly Spindles, International Quality
Outer Tire: Excelletn Skid Proof Mountain Tire
Inner Tire: Leakage Protection Butyl tire, No second Inflation for 3 Months
Bearing: Heavy Manganese Steel Mute Bearing
Saddle: Large Saddle with Removable Poly-nylon Guarded Rails
Seat post clamp: Quick Release, Alloy Aluminum
Rim: Extra Thick Alloy Aluminum Rim
Fork: Steel Fork with Powder Coated Finish
Great for both Novices and Professionals, Men and Women
Rational designed according to somatology and movement features

Specification: 

16" wheel (16" x 1.75" Tire)
Weight limit: 110Lbs, fits to applicable height from 45" to 61"
Distance from seat to pedal: 15" - 29"
Adjustable bicycle height: 28" - 32"

Package Content: 

1 x Wheel Unicycle

Notice: 

Novices should ride under the instructions or accompany of your tutors for safety. And the best place for your training is a back deck or a baseball field with a chain-link fence. Pick a grassy area with solid, flat dirt and you can hold onto the fence.
feature_bullets: Weight limit: 110Lbs, fits to applicable height from 45" to 61"
Outer Tire: Excelletn Skid Proof Mountain Tire; Inner Tire: Leakage Protection Butyl tire, No second Inflation for 3 Months
Rational designed according to somatology and movement features
Great for both Novices and Professionals, Men and Women
